scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json
scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && rimraf dist && webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode production
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec 'npm run build:dev && npm start' -e ts --ignore dist/
scripts.dev:inspect: nodemon --exec 'npm run build:dev && node --inspect dist/index.js' -e ts --ignore dist/
scripts.install:clean: npm i rimraf -D && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
